name: UISemanticContentAttribute
desc: A semantic description of the viewâ€™s contents, used to determine whether the view should be flipped when switching between left-to-right and right-to-left layouts.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: The default value for views. The view is flipped when switching between left-to-right and right-to-left layouts.

items.name: case playback
items.desc: A view representing the playback controls, such as Play, Rewind, or Fast Forward buttons or playhead scrubbers. These views are not flipped when switching between left-to-right and right-to-left layouts.

items.name: case spatial
items.desc: A view representing a directional control, such as a segment control for text alignment, or a D-pad control for a game. These views are not flipped when switching between left-to-right and right-to-left layouts.

items.name: case forceLeftToRight
items.desc: A view that is always displayed using a left-to-right layout.

items.name: case forceRightToLeft
items.desc: A view that is always displayed using a right-to-left layout.
